channel.title: I need help on the following:
channel.description:
1.i need help on workng specs::d scim,wipe,c bow,d bow,and mage bow
2.i want these guys to say r3d is online or 0o0 is online...1 sayin 1 thing and 1 saying th other....
3.i want to know how to ip ban if possible tat you can teach me.
who ever can answer 1 of these get mod,2 of these admin,3 of these co owner on my server.i no its not nothing good but atlseat its sumthin?.....[br][size=1]Posted on: September 09, 2007, 03:07:33 AM[/size][hr]any1 please help?

item.title: I need help on the following:
item.dc:creator: @drabuzis drabuzis
item.description:
@drabuzis wrote:

to ipban go to characters and find the guy that u want to ipban copy hes ip and paste to “server”/data/bannedips after that he can make account but just when he logs out hes account be banned and this gonna be all time.its just like account restarter but u cant even log in after u log out

item.source: I need help on the following:

item.title: I need help on the following:
item.dc:creator: @Nemes1s Nemes1s
item.description:
@Nemes1s wrote:

For the second one.
Open up NPC Handler and search moo.
Then you should see this:

		if (npcs[i].npcType == 81 || npcs[i].npcType == 397 || npcs[i].npcType == 1766 || npcs[i].npcType == 1767 || npcs[i].npcType == 1768) {
						if (misc.random2(50) == 1) {
							npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
							npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
							npcs[i].textUpdate = "Moo";
						}
					}

After the last } press enter twice.

Then copy and paste this into the space:

 if (npcs[i].npcType == NPC ID)
					{
						if (misc.random2(10) <= 3) //this is the time delay
						{
	                                                 npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
							npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
							if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("YOURNAME"))
							{
								npcs[i].textUpdate = "YOURNAME is online!";
							}
							else
							{
								npcs[i].textUpdate = "YOURNAME is offline!";
							}
												}

Then replace YOURNAME with w/e and NPC ID with the id of the npc you want to say it. Then open up autospawn.cfg
You should see something like: brbr//------NpcID---CoordX--CoordY--Height--RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Descrption //--Start of JadMiniGame spawn = 2745 3371 9647 0 0 0 0 0 1 jadgame spawn = 2745 3379 9655 0 0 0 0 0 1 jadgame
After the description press enter once.
Then add:

spawn = NPC ID X Coord Y Coord 0 0 0 0 0 1 Online/Offline NPC

Save and compile[br][size=1]Posted on: September 09, 2007, 04:12:25 AM[/size][hr]For Ip ban, with your commands, add:

if(command.startsWith("ipban") && (playerRights >= 2 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("YOURNAME"))) { String victim = command.substring(6); PlayerHandler.kickNick = victim; int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(victim); if(otherPIndex != -1 && server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex] != null) { client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex]; appendToBannedIP(p.connectedFrom); } System.out.println("Admin:"+playerName+" is IPbanning "+victim); sendMessage("Player "+victim+" successfully IPbanned"); } [br][size=1]Posted on: September 09, 2007, 04:15:51 AM[/size][hr]Adding specials is alot more difficult, search for tutorials on it, on here and rune-server. RageZone.com also has a few, but i’ve never used tuts from ther :S

Read full topic
